comment: /**  * Specify one or more populators to delegate to.  */
code: /**  * Specify one or more populators to delegate to.  */ public void setPopulators(DatabasePopulator... populators) {     this.populators.clear().     this.populators.addAll(Arrays.asList(populators)). }

comment: /**  * Add one or more populators to the list of delegates.  */
code: /**  * Add one or more populators to the list of delegates.  */ public void addPopulators(DatabasePopulator... populators) {     this.populators.addAll(Arrays.asList(populators)). }
@Override public void populate(Connection connection) throws SQLException, ScriptException {     for (DatabasePopulator populator : this.populators) {         populator.populate(connection).     } }
